column5: Hi Everyone, its me again. I was thinking if someone could tell me which knot or How to tie your line on your reel. I would really like to know? Thanxs for your imput
Check out this link. It has a number of knots which could work well for attaching line to a real http://www.troutlet.com/UserMods/fishing-knots.asp  Cheers !!
AWESOME thanxs, thats what I need.
A NOOSE!!!! THAT"LL WORK EVERY TIME!!   really.       good luck fishin.  RaNDY
